    • placeOrder

      @PostMapping("/place") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<OrderResponseDTO> placeOrder(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @RequestBody OrderRequestDTO orderRequestDTO)
      Place order by orderRequestDTO. Allocated requested products, creates order and returns orderResponseDTO.
      Parameters:
      token - JWT token.
      orderRequestDTO - order request info.
      Returns:
      orderResponseDTO or string exception message.
